title: Got marked as an AFKer and put in low priority queue cause my client isn't connecting to games
body: For my last 3 games, I've managed to get through champ select and it started a game, but the game would never actually load. It would pop up that error box saying you can't connect and offering the option to try to reconnect or cancel. But even if I pressed reconnect, it wouldn't connect. If I restarted the client, it wouldn't connect. If I restarted my computer, it wouldn't connect. It's annoying to get punished for this, but I can get over that with time. The real issue is I can't figure out why the hell I suddenly can't connect to games.

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be issues in your local network settings causing issues with your PC reaching our game servers. I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure those settings are fine. I suggest testing changes in a custom match to avoid incurring further penalties.

Let me know if you see further issues after taking those steps.
